name: Yii2 OAuth 2.0 Server
body:
### Yii2 OAuth 2.0

Unlike other implementations, this project is made entirely on the basis of the framework Yii2, with the support of the major design patterns

### Feautures

Using behaviors to provide the necessary functionality in your controller.
Saving session authorization request gives the option to switch on additional steps, including possible to withdraw authorization from third-party providers, such as Facebook or Google.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
